# Project RoboCar

In the project RoboCar members of the meetup group Esslinger Makerspace Projekt: Autonomen RoboCar bauen https://www.meetup.com/Esslingen-Makerspace/ build an autonmous RC car which shall be able to drive through a course without human intervention.

This documentation shall act as an archive for 

-	[Minutes of meetups](#minutesOfMeeting) 
-	Links to resources
-	Experiences gathered
